translations.source: 上海市政工程设计研究总院（集团）有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Municipal Engineering Design Institute (Group) Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 上海市政工程设计研究总院（集团）有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Municipal Engineering Design Institute (Group) Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 上海华城工程建设管理有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Huacheng Engineering Construction Management Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 建设单位执行基本建设程序情况:
translations.target: Implementation of Basic Construction Procedures by the Owner:

translations.source: 本工程按国家有关规定执行建设工程有关程序，按照国家有关规定完成设计、施工和监理的招投标工作及相关手续，2021年12月完成本标段施工单位、监理单位的公开招标，明确了本工程土建施工单位为上海市机械施工集团有限公司，监理单位为上海华城工程建设管理有限公司。施工许可证取得时间为2021年12月28日;
translations.target: This project implemented the procedures for construction works in accordance with relevant national regulations, and completed the bidding and tendering for design, construction, and supervision as well as the related formalities in accordance with national requirements. In December 2021, public bidding for the contractor and supervision unit of this contract section was completed, confirming Shanghai Mechanical Construction Group Co., Ltd. as the civil works contractor and Shanghai Huacheng Engineering Construction Management Co., Ltd. as the supervision unit. The construction permit was obtained on December 28, 2021.

translations.source: 本项目严格执行国家法律和行业法规，按照基本建设程序进行管理，及时办理各种建设手续，包括项目概算、建设用地、规划报批、图纸审查、消防审核开工报告、等，各项手续齐全，确保工程顺利进行。
translations.target: This project strictly complied with national laws and industry regulations and was managed in accordance with the basic construction procedures. Various construction administrative formalities were handled in a timely manner, including project budget estimate approval, construction land use, planning application and approval, drawing review, fire protection review, and commencement report, etc. All required procedures were completed to ensure smooth project implementation.

translations.source: 施工过程中对工程质量、进度、投资、安全以及外部协调等工作进行科学管理，顺利保证了工程目标实现。
translations.target: During construction, scientific management was carried out for project quality, schedule, cost, safety, and external coordination, ensuring the successful achievement of project objectives.

translations.source: 项目建设单位主体资格、管理人员资质满足项目质量管理要求。建设单位依法进行了工程发包,通过公开招标等法定程序选定参建单位并签订了有效的承包合同。
translations.target: The project owner's legal entity qualifications and the qualifications of its management personnel met the requirements for project quality management. The owner lawfully awarded the works, selected participating parties through statutory procedures such as public bidding, and executed valid contracts.

translations.source: 及时办理了消防、施工图审核、质量和安全监督、施工许可等各项建设行政管理手续。施工中对各参建单位质量保证体系和质量行为进行了有效监控和协调，按规定主持了施工图会审、特殊施工方案专家评审，第一次工地会议、分部工程质量验收等相关工作，核查并签署了相关质量保证资料。按照规定程序进行了设计变更、施工洽商的编制、审核、会签和实施。工程一直处于受控状态，未发生安全、质量事故，圆满完成建设任务。
translations.target: Administrative procedures such as fire protection review, construction drawing review, quality and safety supervision, and construction permitting were handled in a timely manner. During construction, the quality assurance systems and quality practices of all participating entities were effectively monitored and coordinated. In accordance with requirements, the owner presided over activities including the joint review of construction drawings, expert review of special construction schemes, the first site meeting, and quality acceptance of divisional works, and verified and signed the relevant quality assurance documentation. Design changes and construction technical clarifications were prepared, reviewed, jointly signed, and implemented in accordance with the prescribed procedures. The project remained under control throughout, with no safety or quality incidents, and the construction tasks were successfully completed.
